title: Yammy Nevliya bilingual recipes frontend (Explore, Detail, New Recipe, theme, assets)

requirements.summary: Implement a bilingual (Hindi/English) UI with a global language toggle that switches recipe content and key UI labels without reload.
acceptanceCriteria: A single language toggle is visible in the main header/navigation.
Toggling the language switches recipe titles, descriptions, ingredients, and steps between Hindi and English without reloading the page.
Key UI labels (navigation, search placeholder, form labels/buttons) change language consistently with the toggle.

file_operations.description: Create a language context/provider (Hindi/English) with a global toggle state and helper utilities for selecting bilingual recipe fields. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a centralized dictionary for key UI labels (navigation, search, filters, form labels/buttons) in English and Hindi.

Implement the main header/navigation including a visible global Hindi/English toggle and translated navigation labels. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Dropdown/Select) to render the toggle. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wrap the app with LanguageProvider and wire Header so all pages can access current language and translations.
Ensure explore/list UI reads current language and renders recipe title/description/metadata in the selected language.
Ensure recipe detail UI reads current language and renders bilingual title/description/ingredients/steps in the selected language.
Ensure the new-recipe form UI labels and helper text switch languages consistently with the global toggle.

requirements.summary: Build the primary pages and navigation: Explore with search + category/cuisine filters, recipe list/grid cards with photos/metadata, and recipe detail page.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate between an explore/list view and a recipe detail view.
Search filters the displayed recipes based on the currently selected language content.
Category and cuisine filters can be applied to narrow the list results.
Each recipe card shows an image, title, and at least category/cuisine and time/servings metadata.
Recipe detail page shows the recipe image, bilingual title/description, ingredients, steps, and metadata.

file_operations.description: Add client-side routing and navigation wiring for Explore (home), Recipe Detail, and New Recipe flows; ensure header navigation links reach these views.

Create a frontend backend-connection helper that provides access to the Motoko canister methods defined in frontend/src/backend.d.ts using the core-infrastructure setup. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add React Query hooks for fetching all recipes, fetching by id, and fetching by category/cuisine, and provide a client-side search utility that filters based on current language fields. Use React Query to manage caching and loading states. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a recipe card component for the explore grid showing photo, localized title, and key metadata (category/cuisine, time, servings). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Badge) for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create search + filter controls (search input, category filter, cuisine filter) with localized labels/placeholders. Use shadcn-ui components (Input, Select/Dropdown) for controls. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement the Home/Explore page: hero/branding area, search and filters, and a responsive recipe list/grid driven by React Query data and client-side search in the current language.
Implement recipe detail page: image, localized title/description, metadata, ingredients, and steps, with loading/error states driven by React Query.
Create a compact metadata display (category, cuisine, prep/cook times, servings, created date) reusable across card and detail views.

requirements.summary: Add an in-app recipe creation form supporting all bilingual fields and metadata, including controlled selection of a static photo asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: A user can open a 'New Recipe' flow from the UI and submit a recipe.
Submitting creates the recipe in the backend and it appears in the list immediately after creation.
The form includes inputs for all required bilingual and metadata fields, and a controlled way to choose a photoAssetPath from known static assets.
Validation prevents submission when required fields are missing (at minimum: title, category, cuisine, and photoAssetPath).

file_operations.description: Create a New Recipe page (or routed view) with the full bilingual recipe form, localized labels, and submit/cancel actions.

Implement a controlled recipe form with inputs for all bilingual fields and metadata, basic validation, and submit handler. Use shadcn-ui form controls (Input, Textarea, Select, Button) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a controlled photoAssetPath selector limited to known static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (display thumbnail + path selection). Use shadcn-ui components for selection UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a React Query mutation hook to submit a new recipe via the backend addRecipe function and invalidate/refetch recipe list queries upon success. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a visible 'New Recipe' navigation entry/button to open the New Recipe flow; ensure label is localized. Use shadcn-ui Button for the action. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the New Recipe view into routing so it is reachable from navigation and returns to Explore after successful creation.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, distinctive food-themed visual design (no blue/purple as primary) across header, navigation, cards, filters, forms, and detail pages with responsive layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: UI styling is consistent across all pages and major components.
Theme uses a food-appropriate palette that does not rely on blue/purple as primary colors.
Layouts are responsive and usable on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind + shadcn-compatible global styles and set warm brand CSS variables (primary/secondary/accent) using an appetizing palette (e.g., amber/orange/earth tones) while avoiding blue/purple as primary.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions as needed to support the warm brand palette and consistent typography/spacing for a recipe site.
Apply consistent header layout, spacing, and responsive behavior using Tailwind and shadcn-ui primitives. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure Explore layout is responsive (hero + filters + grid) and visually consistent with the site theme.
Ensure detail page typography (ingredients/steps), spacing, and image presentation match the theme and remain mobile-friendly.
Ensure the creation form layout is responsive, clearly grouped (EN/HI sections), and matches theme.

requirements.summary: Add and wire generated static images (logo/hero + recipe photos) under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them for branding and recipe photos via photoAssetPath.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not proxied through the backend).
The header/landing area displays the generated logo and/or hero image.
Seeded recipes display the generated recipe photos correctly in list and detail views.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero banner image asset for the Explore/landing hero area.
Add the generated logo image asset for the site header/branding.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Add generated recipe image asset for seeded recipes.
Render the logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/yammy-nevliya-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header and ensure it links back to Explore.

Render the hero banner from frontend/public/assets/generated/yammy-nevliya-hero.dim_1600x600.png in the landing/explore hero area and ensure recipe cards render images via each recipe's photoAssetPath.
Ensure the recipe detail view renders the recipe image using the recipe's photoAssetPath and handles missing/broken assets gracefully.

Populate the photo selection list with the known generated asset paths: frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-samosa.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-pizza.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-sushi.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-chocolate-cake.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-tacos.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/recipe-ramen.dim_1200x800.png.
